content: the hannah scarf about this project- this is part of a series of hats and scarves dedicated to very special women and girls who are very dear to me dedication to hannah- she was and will always be my gift crochet level- intermediate materials needed hook any hook size- choose your hook according to yarn choice yarn any yarn but fuzzy or furry yarn is not recommended about 150-200 yards notes yarn used in sample is red heart supersaver loops and threads and hobby lobby i love this yarn #4 worsted weight yarn hook used is size j or 6mm yardage may vary depending on yarn choice and hook used 3 colors were used to make the sample scarf yarn needle stitch markers optional stitch abbreviations used in this pattern gauge- is not crucial for this project chain- chain sonja otto © 2025 cont- continue fphdc- front post half_double_crochet lsc- long single_crochet mf- make fringe repeat- repeat round s - round s single_crochet- single_crochet skip- skip slip_stitch- slip_stitch st- stitch the hannah scarf page 1 of 4 directions notes scarf is made in row you can make your scarf as long as you want feel free to use as many colors as desired sample scarf was made using 3 colors make a chain as long as you want your scarf making sure your chain is an even number you can use stitch markers to help you count your chain note sample scarf was made with 200 chains row 1 working in back bump of chain single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet across note the fringe is crocheted onto the scarf if you don t like fringe feel free to skip that step and chain 1 and turn before working next row special stitches mf make fringe work a chain as long as you want your fringe sample scarf fringe was made with 22 chains yarn over in 3rd chain from hook pull up a loop 3 loops on hook yarn over pull through 2 loops yarn over insert hook back into the same chain and pull up a loop 4 loops on hook yarn over pull through 4 loops in next chain work a slip_stitch cont to slip_stitch across chain row 2 mf turn single_crochet in first st single_crochet across at end of row mf row 3 repeat row 2 note at end of row 3 you can change colors if you want see tutorial below on changing colors changing colors tutorial when working the fringe insert hook in last chain of fringe work in chain however you like take next color and pull through to complete the last slip_stitch on chain cut previous color the hannah scarf page 2 of 4 note this scarf is reversible but for the pattern the even row will be considered the right side special stitches lsc long single_crochet also known as a spike stitch - to work a lsc single_crochet in st indicated 2 row below at the bottom of the single_crochet
